body.name: Sceptre New 27-inch Gaming Monitor 100Hz 1ms DisplayPort HDMI x2 100% sRGB AMD FreeSync Build-in Speakers, Eye Care Frameless Machine Black 2024 (E275W-FW100T)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 secs
features: 100% sRGB Color Gamut: With 100% sRGB, our display reveals an astonishing brightness and variance in red, green, and blue color across a wide gamut, providing a more defined and naturalistic display of color in every image.

DP & HDMI Ports: Two HDMI ports and one DisplayPort port provide up to 100Hz refresh rate, refining picture clarity in all action-packed gaming sequences and graphic design projects. Audio In and a Headphone Jack provide diverse audio options.
Blue Light Shift: Blue Light Shift reduces blue light, allowing you to comfortably work, watch, or play applications without straining your eyes.
Built-in Speakers: Perfectly suited to work & gaming settings, built-in speakers deliver robust & smooth audio while saving space on your desk.
FPS-RTS Game Modes: FPS and RTS are Sceptre's custom set display settings built for an enhanced gaming experience. FPS (First Person Shooter), RTS (Real-Time Strategy).

VESA Wall Mountable: The VESA wall mount pattern gives you the freedom to select the optimum viewing position for your monitor, eliminate cable clutter, and save valuable space for your gaming and work station.
body.description: 27" Full HD 100Hz LED Gaming Monitor 1920 x 1080 FHD Resolution Up to 100Hz Refresh Rate 2 x HDMI, 1 x DP VESA Wall-Mountable AMD Freesync Supported

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I really love this monitor, good size, clarity is supreme, refresh rates are great, and the overall quality is very good. The only drawback I can see is the speakers, they are very tinny sounding and distorted at any volume. But, I didn't buy this for the sound, a good sound bar or bluetooth takes care of this problem. Overall, this was a very good buy, well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Gaming Performance and Value!
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely thrilled with the Sceptre 24-inch Professional Thin 1080p LED Monitor – it's a fantastic addition to my gaming setup! As a budget-conscious gamer who values both screen quality and performance, this monitor has exceeded my expectations on all fronts.First and foremost, the screen quality is nothing short of impressive. The 1080p resolution delivers crystal-clear visuals that bring my games to life. The colors are vibrant, and the contrast is spot-on, creating an immersive gaming experience that truly enhances every detail.The monitor's slim and sleek design adds a touch of modern elegance to my setup. Its thin profile not only looks great but also maximizes desk space, allowing me to fully immerse myself in the gaming world without distractions.What truly sets this monitor apart is its gaming performance. The refresh rate and response time are on point, ensuring smooth and fluid gameplay even in fast-paced titles. I've noticed a significant improvement in my gaming performance since switching to this monitor, and I can now react faster and more accurately to in-game situations.As someone who appreciates value, I must say that this monitor offers an exceptional bang for the buck. It provides all the features and performance of a high-end gaming monitor at a fraction of the cost. I've compared it to monitors with much higher price tags, and the Sceptre 24-inch monitor holds its own impressively.Whether you're a casual gamer or a dedicated enthusiast, this monitor is a stellar choice. It combines impressive screen quality, excellent gaming performance, and affordability into a single package that's hard to beat.In conclusion, if you're searching for a top-notch gaming monitor that won't break the bank, the Sceptre 24-inch Professional Thin 1080p LED Monitor is the answer. It has elevated my gaming experience to new heights, and I can confidently say that it's a true game-changer. Say goodbye to blurry visuals and lag – this monitor delivers the ultimate gaming performance at an unbeatable value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've owned 3 for 6 years and not a single pixel has died
reviews.reviewText: I dont get it, I purchased this with the express purpose of it being a cheap monitor I found on Amazon. For context, I use my computer almost daily for 5+ hours a day nearly every day during that time period. These things are durable. I've fit them inside of a duffle bag and taken them onto a plane with no damage, they've survived multiple moves, not even the cables have gone out. They do have some downsides though. Their audio quality is terrible, and they definitely aren't the best. But they are the best for your buck monitor and one I highly recommend to people regardless. I'd recommend picking up a lower resolution, high refresh rate monitor and one of these when doing a cheaper pc build or just one of these by themselves if you can't afford another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough for home office, but sound is so-so
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to setup and performs pretty much as expected. It's an inexpensive monitor with builtin speakers. The screen is large enough and the picture quality is decent. The only issue is the sound is tinny, with almost no bass. Still, it works well enough for my purposes, i.e. background music while working and the occasional video call.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good looking monitor, very easy to connect, good display. I use it for my home office and don't waste my time gaming so I can't comment on it's use for that, but very pleased, excellent value for the money, the built-in speakers save desk space and although the sound isn't the greatest quality it's perfectly adequate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Monitor (TV too!)
reviews.reviewText: I am not a gamer, I just purchased this monitor for work because I wanted a large monitor. I got the 27 inch, 100hz model. It’s great for work. I actually got a Sceptre TV on Black Friday literally like 12 years ago and it is still working perfectly, so I really trust the brand. Plus the price was better than any other 27 inch HD monitor I could find. My son asked if he could use it as a TV, so we plugged in the Apple TV 4K. We were blown away by the picture quality. It’s more clear than our 65 inch 4K LG TV. I don’t know how much of that is the Apple TV to be fair. But I can tell you that the picture quality is fantastic. As far as using it as a TV, I do you have to admit that the speakers are really bad for that. But we just plug it into our Bluetooth speaker and don’t know the difference. I really recommend this monitor. I’m very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Secondary Monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these to replace two 32-inch 1080p monitors I was using a secondary monitors. The picture quality and color is great with these. I could see myself using them as primary monitors. The only downside is that they are only 75hz, but that's not a shocker or surprise as they are clearly advertised as such. I personally could not use it as a primary monitor because I primarily play shooters and every frame counts, but if you are on a budget and do not care about refresh rate, this makes a great regular use monitor and gaming monitor. The picture is crystal clear in my opinion! And the price is perfect (at time of review).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Second Monitor or Budget Monitor
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic price for what it’s work. I bought this as a second monitor and it works great! The size is perfect, not to big and not to small. I was impressed with the quality of the monitor, if you’re looking into a gaming monitor and need a really cheap one this is great.This was also a super easy setup. Had it complete within 10 minutes.

Great product, the visuals are amazing. I use this monitor for gaming and it runs smoother than my tv. What sets this monitor aside from most monitors is that it has an input audio and output audio source which is pretty awesome because I can just plug my headphones into the monitor and hear everything clearly. The audio on its own is not the greatest without headphones as I’m used to the surround sound system on my tv, however if you put headphones into the monitor, the sound is perfect. In terms of the audio without headphones, I had difficulty trying to distinguish where enemies were during games based on their footsteps, however when I put headphones in, I was able to properly distinguish where people were. So I’m conclusion, it’s an amazing product and definitely worth your money, but if you’re gonna use it for gaming, make sure you have headphones or another audio input !!
Very satisfied with this monitor and recommended.
Item arrived well packed and within time. Colour coded ports were very helpful.
